metadata.description: Xcode Command Line Tools inventory with MacPorts replacements
metadata.purpose: Replace Apple-provided CLI tools with version-controlled MacPorts equivalents

tools.name: git
tools.notes: Includes git-receive-pack, git-shell, git-upload-archive, git-upload-pack

tools.name: make
tools.notes: Apple ships ancient GNU Make 3.81. MacPorts provides 4.x as 'gmake'. Also available as 'gnumake' in CLT.

tools.name: bison
tools.notes: Apple ships very old bison 2.3 (GPLv2). MacPorts provides 3.x.

tools.name: flex
tools.notes: Also provides flex++ and lex

tools.name: m4
tools.notes: Apple ships old 1.4.6. MacPorts provides 1.4.20+. Also available as gm4/bm4 in CLT.

tools.name: gperf
tools.notes: Perfect hash function generator

tools.name: python3
tools.notes: Apple ships old Python 3.9. MacPorts provides current 3.13. Also installs pip3.

tools.name: clang
tools.notes: Upstream LLVM/Clang. Also installs clang-format, clangd, etc. Apple clang version numbers don't match upstream.

tools.name: llvm
tools.notes: Covers llvm-cov, llvm-nm, llvm-objdump, llvm-profdata, llvm-size, llvm-cxxfilt, llvm-dwarfdump

tools.name: gcc
tools.notes: Apple's 'gcc' is actually clang. MacPorts provides real GCC. Also available: gcc15.

tools.name: ctags
tools.notes: Apple ships old BSD ctags. Universal Ctags is the actively maintained successor to Exuberant Ctags.

tools.name: libtool
tools.notes: Apple libtool is NOT GNU libtool. MacPorts installs as glibtool to avoid conflict.

tools.name: byacc
tools.notes: Berkeley Yacc. CLT also ships yacc pointing to the same tool.

tools.name: unifdef
tools.notes: Remove preprocessor conditionals from code

tools.name: binutils
tools.notes: GNU binutils. Covers ar, nm, strip, ranlib, objdump, strings. Prefixed with 'g' to avoid conflicts.

tools.name: cctools
tools.notes: Apple cctools: lipo, install_name_tool, etc. MacPorts port is a rebuild from Apple open source.

tools.name: dsymutil
tools.notes: Provided by the llvm-21 port as dsymutil-mp-21. No standalone port exists.

tools.name: lldb
tools.notes: LLVM native debugger. Depends on llvm-21 and clang-21.

tools.name: swift
tools.notes: No MacPorts port. Swift toolchains are available from swift.org as standalone downloads.

tools.name: ld
tools.notes: mold is a faster drop-in replacement for Unix linkers. ld-classic also available in CLT.

skipped_tools.description: CLT binaries intentionally excluded from this inventory
skipped_tools.reason: These are Apple-platform-specific, symlinks/aliases to other tools, or part of ecosystems (Swift, HeaderDoc) that cannot be meaningfully replaced via MacPorts.
